00001 import rospy
00002 import shelve
00003 
00004 
00005 class LocationDb(object):
00006     def __init__(self, db_filename, tf_listener):
00007         self._db = shelve.open(db_filename)
00008         self._tf_listener = tf_listener
00009 
00010     def get_all_locations(self):
00011         return self._db.items()
00012 
00013     def get_location(self, name):
00014         if name in self._db:
00015             return self._db[name]
00016         else:
00017             return None
00018 
00019     def remove_location(self, name):
00020         if name in self._db:
00021             del self._db[name]
00022             return True
00023         else:
00024             return False
00025 
00026     def set_location(self, name, pose_stamped):
00027         if rospy.resolve_name(pose_stamped.header.frame_id) != '/map':
00028             pose_stamped.header.stamp = rospy.Time(0)
00029             try:
00030                 pose_stamped = self._tf_listener.transformPose(
00031                     '/map', pose_stamped)
00032             except:
00033                 rospy.logerr(
00034                     '[LocationDb] TF error while setting location {}'.format(
00035                         name))
00036                 return False
00037 
00038         self._db[name] = pose_stamped
00039         return True
